speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but why are you calling me?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your overdue account with Green Finance. It's important we discuss this.

speaker: Customer
text: I don't want to talk about it. I've requested to be put on a do not call list before.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I can help you with marking your number for the do not call list.

speaker: Customer
text: Please do that. I really don't want any more calls.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I will ensure your number is marked. Thank you for your patience.
